title: Mount Pleasant National Scenic Area Act
content: Mount Pleasant National Scenic Area Act - Establishes in the George Washington National Forest, Virginia, the Mount Pleasant National Scenic Area. Sets forth provisions regarding: (1) administration of the Area, (2) roads, (3) vegetation management, (4) motorized travel, (5) fire, (6) insects and disease. And (7) water. Directs the Secretary of Agriculture to develop a management plan for the Area. Withdraws all federally-owned lands within the Area from disposition under the mining, mineral, and geothermal leasing laws.
